nodes.text: The SoroSuub Centroplex was the headquarters of the SoroSuub Corporation on the planet of Sullust. The Centroplex's tech division developed weapons, sensors, vehicles, and other technological goods for the Galactic Empire. Shortly following the Siege of Inyusu Tor, the Alliance to Restore the Republic sent Pathfinders to eliminate the Imperial forces stationed at the SoroSuub Centroplex.
